title: erik spiekermann book font?
content:
Looks like some sort of Akzidenz type grotesk but the /i/ has a rounded dot. Not sure why I don't know this one...  
Thanks everyone!

author: wolfattack

comments.content:
At first, I thought the font wasn't designed by Erik, since it didn't appear to match any of his output.

Then, I discovered this: [http://usshop.gestalten.com/hello-erik.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419154056/http:/usshop.gestalten.com/hello-erik.html "http://usshop.gestalten.com/hello-erik.html")

The font is called Real, and was designed by Spiekermann specifically for this project. You get it free when you buy the book.
Real is Spiekermann's redesign of beloved Akzidenz Grotesk in one weight only especially for this book. Very readable.
